languages.text: "Лорд-капитан! Я прошу вас провести проверку действий старшего офицера Версериана. И вмешаться в происходящее на нижних палубах, потому что еще немного — и нас ждет либо бунт, либо резня". {n}Последние две фразы Аврилла тараторит, как заученные — видно, что она давно готовилась произнести их. Договорив, она взволнованно косится на Абеляра, потом на вас.{/n}

"Lord Captain! I urge you to investigate the actions of Seneschal Werserian. And to intervene in what's happening on the lower decks, because very soon we will have a mutiny or a massacre on our hands." {n}Vent reels off the last words as though she knows them by heart — she has clearly been preparing to say them for some time. When she is finished, she casts an anxious glance at Abelard, then at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан! Я прошу вас провести проверку действий старшего офицера Версериана. И вмешаться в происходящее на нижних палубах, потому что еще немного — и нас ждет либо бунт, либо резня". {n}Последние две фразы Аврилла тараторит, как заученные — видно, что она давно готовилась произнести их. Договорив, она взволнованно косится на Абеляра, потом на вас.{/n}

When she is finished, she casts an anxious glance at Abelard, then at you.{/n}

When she is finished, she casts an anxious glance at Abelard, then at you.{/n}

languages.text: “领主舰长！我恳请您调查韦尔森总领的决定，对底层甲板正在发生的事情进行干预。因为恐怕过不了多久，那边就会发生一场叛乱，或是一场屠杀。”{n}温特很快说完了最后这句话，仿佛早已烂熟于心一样。很显然，她这几句话已经演练过好几次了。说完这些之后，她焦急地看了看阿贝拉德，又看了看你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I urge you to investigate the actions of Seneschal Werserian. And to intervene in what's happening on the lower decks, because very soon we will have a mutiny or a massacre on our hands." {n}Vent reels off the last words as though she knows them by heart — she has clearly been preparing to say them for some time. When she is finished, she casts an anxious glance at Abelard, then at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “领主舰长！我恳请您调查韦尔森总领的决定，对底层甲板正在发生的事情进行干预。因为恐怕过不了多久，那边就会发生一场叛乱，或是一场屠杀。”{n}温特很快说完了最后这句话，仿佛早已烂熟于心一样。很显然，她这几句话已经演练过好几次了。说完这些之后，她焦急地看了看阿贝拉德，又看了看你。{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán! Le ruego que investigue las acciones del Senescal Werserian. Y que intervenga en la situación en las cubiertas inferiores, porque pronto tendremos en nuestras manos un motín o una masacre». {n}Las últimas palabras de Vent le salen de corrido, como si las hubiera memorizado. Claramente ha estado preparando este discurso un tiempo. Cuando termina, mira nerviosa a Abelard y luego te mira a ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I urge you to investigate the actions of Seneschal Werserian. And to intervene in what's happening on the lower decks, because very soon we will have a mutiny or a massacre on our hands." {n}Vent reels off the last words as though she knows them by heart — she has clearly been preparing to say them for some time. When she is finished, she casts an anxious glance at Abelard, then at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán! Le ruego que investigue las acciones del Senescal Werserian. Y que intervenga en la situación en las cubiertas inferiores, porque pronto tendremos en nuestras manos un motín o una masacre». {n}Las últimas palabras de Vent le salen de corrido, como si las hubiera memorizado. Claramente ha estado preparando este discurso un tiempo. Cuando termina, mira nerviosa a Abelard y luego te mira a ti.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！ウェルザリアン家令長の行動を調査してください。そして、下層デッキで起きていることに介入をお願いします。もうすぐ反乱か大虐殺が起きてしまいます」{n}ヴェントは、まるで暗記しているかのように最後の言葉を口にする…彼女はこの言葉を言うために、以前から準備をしていたのは明らかだ。言い終わると、不安げな視線をアベラルド投げかけ、次にあなたに向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I urge you to investigate the actions of Seneschal Werserian. And to intervene in what's happening on the lower decks, because very soon we will have a mutiny or a massacre on our hands." {n}Vent reels off the last words as though she knows them by heart — she has clearly been preparing to say them for some time. When she is finished, she casts an anxious glance at Abelard, then at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！ウェルザリアン家令長の行動を調査してください。そして、下層デッキで起きていることに介入をお願いします。もうすぐ反乱か大虐殺が起きてしまいます」{n}ヴェントは、まるで暗記しているかのように最後の言葉を口にする…彼女はこの言葉を言うために、以前から準備をしていたのは明らかだ。言い終わると、不安げな視線をアベラルド投げかけ、次にあなたに向けた。{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Ich fordere Euch auf, das Verhalten von Truchsess Werserian zu untersuchen. Und auf den Unterdecks einzuschreiten, denn bald werden wir es mit einer Meuterei oder einem Massaker zu tun haben." {n}Vent rattert die letzten Worte runter, als habe sie sie auswendig gelernt — offenbar hat sie sich schon länger darauf vorbereitet, sie vorzutragen. Als sie fertig ist, blickt sie zunächst Abelard nervös an, dann dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I urge you to investigate the actions of Seneschal Werserian. And to intervene in what's happening on the lower decks, because very soon we will have a mutiny or a massacre on our hands." {n}Vent reels off the last words as though she knows them by heart — she has clearly been preparing to say them for some time. When she is finished, she casts an anxious glance at Abelard, then at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Ich fordere Euch auf, das Verhalten von Truchsess Werserian zu untersuchen. Und auf den Unterdecks einzuschreiten, denn bald werden wir es mit einer Meuterei oder einem Massaker zu tun haben." {n}Vent rattert die letzten Worte runter, als habe sie sie auswendig gelernt — offenbar hat sie sich schon länger darauf vorbereitet, sie vorzutragen. Als sie fertig ist, blickt sie zunächst Abelard nervös an, dann dich.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Je vous conjure de mener l'enquête sur le comportement du sénéchal Werserian. Et d'intervenir en personne dans la crise qui frappe les ponts inférieurs, faute de quoi nous aurons bientôt une mutinerie ou une hécatombe sur les bras. » {n}Vent débite ces derniers mots comme si elle les avait appris par cœur, preuve qu'elle prépare son discours depuis un certain temps déjà. Après avoir dit ce qu'elle avait à dire, elle lance un regard nerveux en direction d'Abélard, avant de se tourner vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I urge you to investigate the actions of Seneschal Werserian. And to intervene in what's happening on the lower decks, because very soon we will have a mutiny or a massacre on our hands." {n}Vent reels off the last words as though she knows them by heart — she has clearly been preparing to say them for some time. When she is finished, she casts an anxious glance at Abelard, then at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Je vous conjure de mener l'enquête sur le comportement du sénéchal Werserian. Et d'intervenir en personne dans la crise qui frappe les ponts inférieurs, faute de quoi nous aurons bientôt une mutinerie ou une hécatombe sur les bras. » {n}Vent débite ces derniers mots comme si elle les avait appris par cœur, preuve qu'elle prépare son discours depuis un certain temps déjà. Après avoir dit ce qu'elle avait à dire, elle lance un regard nerveux en direction d'Abélard, avant de se tourner vers vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan! Seneşal Werserian'ın yaptıklarının ivedilikle araştırılmasını arz ediyorum. Ayrıca alt güvertedeki olaylara müdahil olunmalı, aksi hâlde çok geçmeden bir başkaldırı veya katliam yaşanacaktır." {n}Vent, son cümlesini ezberlemiş gibi telaffuz ediyor. Belli ki bir süredir bunları söylemeyi bekliyormuş. Sözlerini noktaladıktan sonra önce Abelard'a, ardından da sana endişeyle bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I urge you to investigate the actions of Seneschal Werserian. And to intervene in what's happening on the lower decks, because very soon we will have a mutiny or a massacre on our hands." {n}Vent reels off the last words as though she knows them by heart — she has clearly been preparing to say them for some time. When she is finished, she casts an anxious glance at Abelard, then at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan! Seneşal Werserian'ın yaptıklarının ivedilikle araştırılmasını arz ediyorum. Ayrıca alt güvertedeki olaylara müdahil olunmalı, aksi hâlde çok geçmeden bir başkaldırı veya katliam yaşanacaktır." {n}Vent, son cümlesini ezberlemiş gibi telaffuz ediyor. Belli ki bunları söylemek için bir süre hazırlanmış. Sözlerini noktaladıktan sonra önce Abelard'a, ardından da sana endişeyle bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader
